title: cultural_data_Discover_Roman_Forum_&_Palatine_Hill_Audio_Guide
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.discover.roman.forum.
Application Name: Discover Roman Forum & Palatine Hill Audio Guide.
Number of Reviews: 29.00.
Application Description: Discover Roman Forum is the ideal companion for your visit to the Roman Forum and the Palatine Hill! A self-guided walking tour, with hours of audio guides and a map that works offline, it's the ideal tour companion: ✔️Complete: with 33 attractions, discover wonders like the Arch of Titus and the Temple Of Saturn.  Each attraction has a detailed and engaging audio guide.✔️Save: we offer you much more content than the official audio guide, for half the price!✔️Audio Tour: extensive textual and audio guides for each point of interest. Discover the hidden pearls of the Roman Forum!✔️Must-See: don't know where to start? We marked the places you must absolutely visit, to make sure you don't miss the best attractions in the Roman Forum.✔️Offline: save on roaming charges, don't worry about 4G coverage, Discover Roman Forum works offline!So if you are planning a visit to the Roman Forum and the Palatine Hill, make sure to download Discover Roman Forum for a complete and audio guide, map and tour!Read moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 1020.00.
Overall Rate: 4.20.
First Page Reviews: Nice and simple app. it would be a great improvement to include current photos of the landmarks so you could be sure you were reading about the right thing. Also, for the Roman Forum or would be awesome to include reconstructed images, or reconstructed AR view Useful, it worths the money. It should have more info though. Wanted to purchase but no where does it provide a price. Wants you to go thru credit process with no idea of cost. Only free for 5 minutes.
